ch.bfh.ti.sed.patmon1.server.controller

Interface LoginController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LoginControllerImpl

    public interface LoginController
    The login controller is used to login into the system. There is only one login controller in the server.

    It defines a WebService with JAX-WS over which the client can communicate.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Session login(String username, String password)
      Login of the doctor.

    • Method Detail

      • login

        Session login(String username,
            String password)
              throws NotLoggedInException
        Login of the doctor. If the credentials are correct the method returns a Session(ControllerProxy)-Object which should be used for further communication with the server
        Parameters:
        username - username or email of the doctor
        password - password of the doctor
        Returns:
        a SessionControllerProxy-object or null if the credentials are not correct
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException
